targets.query:
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "open_weather_map" and r.name == "Bedford")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "main_temp")
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "open_weather_map" and r.name == "Bedford")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "wind_speed")
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "open_weather_map" and r.name == "Bedford")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "wind_deg")
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "open_weather_map" and r.name == "Bedford")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "main_pressure")
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "open_weather_map" and r.name == "Bedford")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "weather_0_description")
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "open_weather_map" and r.name == "Bedford")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sys_sunrise")
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "open_weather_map" and r.name == "Bedford")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "clouds_all")
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "open_weather_map" and r.name == "Bedford")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "main_humidity")
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "open_weather_map" and r.name == "Bedford")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sys_sunset")
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "fitness")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weight")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: (float(v: r._value) * .00220462) } ))
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

from(bucket: "fitness")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sleepingSeconds")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

import "date"

year = date.year(t: now())

cdate = "${year}-01-01T00:00:00.000000000Z"

ts = time(v: cdate)

type = from(bucket: "fitness")
    |> range(start: ts)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "activityType_typeKey" and r._value == "indoor_cycling")
    |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

distance = from(bucket: "fitness")
    |> range(start: ts)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "distance")
    |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

join(
    tables: {activity:type, distance:distance},
    on: ["_time"],
)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "distance"])

import "date"

year = date.year(t: now())

cdate = "${year}-01-01T00:00:00.000000000Z"

ts = time(v: cdate)

type = from(bucket: "fitness")
    |> range(start: ts)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "activityType_typeKey" and r._value == "road_biking")
    |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

distance = from(bucket: "fitness")
    |> range(start: ts)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "distance")
    |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

join(
    tables: {activity:type, distance:distance},
    on: ["_time"],
)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "distance"])

from(bucket: "fitness")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "totalSteps" or r["_measurement"] == "dailyStepGoal")
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
